sections.name: Summary
sections.summText: Strategic problem-solver and exceptional communicator. Assisted in organizing The Game Machine which successfully founded and is now an operating and growing business. I am very capable and willing to learn new skills in order to complete tasks and finish jobs

tasks: Leveraged social media websites such as Instagram and Facebook to promote services and gauge customer needs and preferences.
Formulated a comprehensive business plan complete with clear and actionable sales goals and targets.
Consistent with following up with potential customers.
Review customer online accounts and assist the customer when needed.
Contacted customers and assisted them in a comprehensive and effective manner.
Positively support the patients as they exercise and further their treatment.
